description:
Digimizer is a easy-to-use and flexible image analysis software package that allows precise manual measurements as well as automatic object detection with measurements of object characteristics.

Pictures may be X-rays, micrographs, etc. Supported file formats are JPG, GIF, TIFF, BMP, PNG, WMF, EMF and DICOM files.

Features include:
* Support for: DGZ, JPG, GIF, TIFF, BMP, PNG, WMF, EMF, and DICOM file formats
* Common image manipulation tasks (crop, rotate, contrast, etc.)
* Manual Measurements:
    * Units (metric attometer through kilometer, imperial inch through mile, degree and pixel)
    * Distances
    * Areas
    * Angles
    * Find centers and perpendiculars
    * Average intensity
    * Mark and count
* Image Analysis
    * Filters including multiple mean, median, and max/min filters
    * Binarization
    * Morphological operations
    * Noise reduction
* Measurements list exportable to spreadsheet
* Statistics on measurements
* Scripting for repetitive tasks
summary: Easy-to-use and flexible image analysis software
author: MedCalc Software
